content.description: Have an official oval race with no incidents.  You must score championship points and complete 50% of the laps the winner class completes, rounded down, for the race to count toward this award.  This award may not be earned while participating in a team event.
content.name: Clean Race - Oval

content.description: Complete 2 consecutive incident free official oval races.  You must score championship points and complete 50% of the laps the class winner completes, rounded down, for the race to count toward this award.  This award may not be earned while participating in a team event.
content.name: Safe Driver Level 1 - Oval

content.description: Complete 5 consecutive incident free official oval races.  You must score championship points and complete 50% of the laps the class winner completes, rounded down, for the race to count toward this award.  This award may not be earned while participating in a team event.
content.name: Safe Driver Level 2 - Oval

content.description: Complete 10 consecutive incident free official oval races.  You must score championship points and complete 50% of the laps the class winner completes, rounded down, for the race to count toward this award.  This award may not be earned while participating in a team event.
content.name: Safe Driver Level 3 - Oval

content.description: Advance 40% of the field from where you started in an official oval race with at least 10 drivers in your class and no more than 3 incidents.
content.name: Good Finish - Oval

content.description: Advance 60% of the field from where you started in an official oval race with at least 10 drivers in your class and no more than 2 incidents.  This award may not be earned while participating in a team event.
content.name: Great Finish - Oval

content.description: Advance 80% of the field from where you started in an official oval race with at least 10 drivers in your class and no more than 1 incident.  This award may not be earned while participating in a team event.
content.name: Outstanding Finish - Oval

content.description: Beat an iRacing employee in an official oval race.  This award may not be earned while participating in a team event.
content.name: iLetYouWin - Oval

content.description: Race at least once a week in the same car class in an oval series for an entire official season of at least 12 weeks.  Drop weeks are allowed.
